name: Alien vs. Tower
description:
This is my Capstone project about Alien vs. Towers. In this game, you will have to defend the end point from being destroyed by the enemy. This game is made by Kaung Htet Kyaw and this game includes 4 levels.

1. Level 1

2. Level 2

3. Level 3

4. Level 4 (Boss included)

This detailed descriptions are shown in how to play scene. Please learn how to play by clicking the button on it.

Enjoy the gameplay!!!
